title: why is akali allowed to camp in her bubble so fucking long?
body:
shes an assassin why is she allowed to just hide in her bubble of safety when ever she loses trades and just life steal  back to full hp no other champion in the game just take a fucking "time out" and wait for CDs, help, or peek in and out to life steal so they can continue face rolling without any punishment that champion is unhealthy to play against period.
the fact that she can stay in there for 8 seconds and even possibly blink to the other side of a damn wall is ridiculous, her becoming visable when ever she attacks is not even enough counter play for that because all she has to do as attack a minion or whatever to get a few hp back then run back in her bubble for instant invisibility  no matter if your attacking her or not. 
and also i really cant stand the fact that you can fucking curb stomp her all lane but as soon as she builds her favorite item {{item:3146}} and hits 6 she proceeds to face roll over your entire team. fix this fuckin champion

replies.body:
Her w duration and the blink is the issue with the champion right now. The blink part of akali's w doesn't mean much to mid lane mages or other ranged champion, but it completely destroys champions like darius and other top laners right now. Akali is op right now so all we can wait for is a nerf and hope that everyone sees that she is busted and anti fun.
Akali is actually bad late game and her mid game isn't op or anything. She's strong early, decent mid, weak late (not to pantheon level, but still weak).

Its really mind bloggling on how much they buffed her shroud.

free dash + 8 second duration, those buffs happened at the same time they completely removed pink wards being able to reveal her.

Didn't they also change her aa to having spell vamp on first aa and damage on the second? Either way, her kit is binary and seems too strong vs melee champions while being destroyed by cc (her ult is extremely telegraphed, even if it seems quick you can cc her in her tracks). She's usually seen as a low elo stomper but right now she's op in high elo too. There's this player with like 3 challenger account as an akali main. I don't like putting 1 person to determine that she is op or not, but it does say that the champion works in high elo very efficiently.
Yep. Because Riot was (at the time) slowly removing Spell Vamp from the game. The only champion that still has it is Lee Sin with his W. And Maw still grants it when the shield procs.
